name: outsystems-integration
description: Simplify the creation and maintenance of your DevOps cycle with the OutSystems VSTS Extension.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.package: npm run build && tfx extension create --rev-version --manifest-globs
scripts.install-task-lib: cd test && npm install --save-dev && cd.. && cd outsystems-task\outsystemsreleasetaskV1 && npm install --save-dev && cd.. && cd.. &&cd outsystems-task\outsystemsreleasetaskV2 && npm install --save-dev
